sentence.idiomatic: You can find the tools you want on this website.
Do you know which tool to download is better?
We need some tools.
Our manager went to attend the electronic trade fair.
You should prepare all the items well.
This commodities fair was very successful.
This company specializes in import and export trade.
We came here specially to visit you.
This shop specializes in sales of crystal ornaments.
She doesn't like this type of film.
He is not the type of person I like.
What type of house do you want to find?
This model of cell phone is a very good value for the money.
Do you know which brand of digital camera is a better value for the money?
A lot of people think Nokia cell phones are the best value for the money.
Although this house is small but it is completely furnished.
This new model of cell phone has a wide array of functions.
We have a very wide array of products, everyone is welcome to come and buy.
This is the brochure for the product. You need to read it carefully.
Do you know where I can buy a Shanghai tourism brochure?
This is a health brochure that the doctor gave me.
When can you give us your quotation form?
Please prepare a quotation form for me, I need it tomorrow.
This is our quotation sheet, please have a look.
Working in sales doesn't suit everyone.
He is the most outstanding salesperson in our company.
In this meeting we will discuss next year's sales plan.
When you have difficulties you can get in touch with me.
Do you still stay in touch with them?
He hasn't gotten in touch with us for a long time.
You'd better consult with him about this matter.
They are discussing travel plans.
We will go back and discuss it.
We are truly looking forward to your arrival.
All children look forward to grow up quickly.
Everyone is looking forward to his next work.
I wish our first collaboration success.
This film is a collaboration between China and South Korea.
Hereafter there will still be many chances for us to continue cooperating.
Hello! Welcome to the International Tool Trade Show. This is our company catalog.
Thank you. What kind of products does your company produce?
Our company specializes in producing various types of tools. Furthermore, our products are a great value for the money.
Do you have small-sized tools? For example hammers, that type of thing?
Of course. You can come over here with me and take a look.
Hmm. Not bad, not bad. You have a very wide selection of products. The quality is pretty good, too.
Sir you have very good taste. Actually, we export our products to a lot of countries. May I ask what country you are from? I’m not sure if you have ever heard of our company’s products before.
I am Canadian. It seems to me that I have heard of this brand before.
It's great that you’ve heard of it. We also have a lot of Canadian customers. You can rest assured, our quality and prices are definitely the best.
I hope that’s the case. Oh yes, do you have a product introduction brochure for specific products and quote sheets?
Yes, right here. Also, here is my business card. I’ll give you our marketing manager’s business card too. If you have any questions, feel free to contact us.
All right. Once I discuss it with my boss, I will get in touch with you as soon as possible.
Thank you. We are looking forward to working with you.
